shrimp.name: FSNoise2D
shrimp.description: Filtered signed 2 dimensional Perlin noise function
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Filtered version of 2 dimensional signed noise. SNoise is exactly like Noise except that the result defaults to the range [-"amplitude","amplitude"] rather than [0,"amplitude"]. The average value is therefore zero. The parameter "amplitude" defaults to 1, so the noise range defaults to [-1,1].
